scripts.refresh-lm-snapshot: source .env && curl -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -H "$HEADER_SECRET" -X POST -d '{"query": "query GetSnapshot { snapshots_new(limit: 1 order_by: {id: desc}) { snapshot_data } }"}' $SNAPSHOT_URL -o ./snapshots/snapshot_lm_latest.json
scripts.refresh-vs-snapshot: source .env && curl -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -H "$HEADER_SECRET" -X POST -d '{"query": "query GetCommissionSnapshot { snapshots_validators(limit: 1 order_by: {id: desc}) { snapshot_data } }"}' $SNAPSHOT_URL -o ./snapshots/snapshot_vs_latest.json
